meanings.definition: Lacking a clear purpose or goal; aimless.
meanings.sent1: She felt lost and directionless in the vast forest.
meanings.sent2: The directionless wanderer roamed the streets without a destination.
meanings.sent3: The directionless puppy kept chasing its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a directionless ship lost at sea.
meanings.sent5: The directionless clouds drifted lazily across the sky.

meanings.sent1: The directionless map left them confused about where to go.
meanings.sent2: The directionless teacher failed to lead the class effectively.
meanings.sent3: The directionless signpost pointed in all the wrong ways.
meanings.sent4: Her directionless advice only added to the confusion.
meanings.sent5: The directionless manual was of no help in assembling the furniture.

meanings.definition: Moving or pointing in no particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The directionless wind blew leaves in every which way.
meanings.sent2: The directionless compass needle spun wildly without settling.
meanings.sent3: The directionless arrow on the signpost confused travelers.
meanings.sent4: His directionless gaze wandered around the room aimlessly.
meanings.sent5: The directionless river meandered through the valley without purpose.
